segments.text: Hello , I'm looking for a shop that sells inexpensive cashmere sweaters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why didn't I think of that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Many of my friends shop at outlets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . That is a good suggestion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm only too happy to help .
segments.speaker: S2
